name: CBSDUpdates
0:
”Alexa open cbsd updates”
”is school closed”
”Alexa ask cbsd updates is school closed”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: c. b. s. d. updates
des:
This skill allows you to get updates about Central Bucks School District.
If school is closed, the skill will let you know, same with if school isn't closed.
Upon opening the skill, you can use the phrase "is school closed" to ask if school is closed.
To launch, just say "Alexa, open CBSD updates"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
